text: Shh I'm congressman Ron Paul from the
Congressional District number 14 in
Texas sitting in the locker room usually
reserved for the Minnesota Timberwolves
Ron Paul is holding court just a few
miles west of the Republican National
Convention Ron Paul may as well be st.
Paul to his ardent followers who find a
common chord in his driving libertarian
message we bring people together with
the one issue and at his issue of
personal liberty and that's why it's
called the campaign for liberty and
people should feel great and comfortable
about it because that to us is what made
America great and that's what the
Constitution was all about that's what
our revolution was all about so we can
get pretty excited about that well I
support Ron Paul's because they stand
for what I believe in and small
government no war independence and
liberty and justice for all well I
campaign for him in Kentucky I walk my
precinct them the day before Election
Day I've been a delegate to my county
convention district convention and state
convention I would have gladly been an
RN C national delegate but uh the
Kentucky Republican Party didn't want to
listen to us officially out of the
Republican race with a little over two
percent of McCain's pledged delegates
Tuesday night is pitched as a counter
convention expecting as many as 18,000
attendees the message is simple so it's
a lot of things a lot of Republicans
used to believe in and we'd like to
reintroduce those ideas to the party
we're trying to tell our children no you
have to sit back and just let everybody
that you can make changes that start
locally and beyond our own areas with

become president nited states make
changes you can do that ideas are one
thing energy is another guest speakers
like former minnesota governor jesse
ventura and conservative commentator

Paul and dr. Paul's feeding off the

removing their apathy and I like the
compliments and quite frankly the other
ones who energized me because I've been
essentially been saying this for 30
years didn't have much of an audience
and all of a sudden I have a big
audience so I getting excited about that
I would say to him thank you dr. Paul
for for helping America to learn what
America should be all about
